channel.title: Srinivasa Chakravarthy on Outliers

item.title: Bharati
item.description: Medium Editor You know, the Medium Editor library is awesome. Just great. But there is a missing feature that some people would like to have. It’s called Markdown. @IonicaBizau created a Medium Editor extension that adds this missing feature. Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen. Edward Berard Let’s test up the elements. First Computer Bug In 1947, Grace Murray Hopper was working on the Harvard University Mark II Aiken Relay Calculator (a primitive computer).
